name: SublimeTheme – Advanced Addons for Elementor
author: SublimeTheme

sections.description:
SublimeTheme – Advanced Adddons for Elementor is an Elementor Addons plugin which contains 7 advanced elementor widget that can create custom layout with ease.

7 Highly Customizable Widgets
1. Latest Posts
2. Icon Text
3. CTA (Call To Action)
4. Counter
5. Pricing
6. Team
7. WP Form (Contact Form)

Copyright

SublimeTheme – Advanced Addons for Elementor plugin, Copyright 2023 SublimeTheme
SublimeTheme – Advanced Addons for Elementor is distributed under the terms of the GNU GPL.

GNU General Public License for more details.

1.0.4 => 08-07-2024

* Fixed: icon color if i tag is used.<h3>1.0.3 => 07-11-2024</h3>    * Updated: Button Icon color and hover color in Icon widget.
* Updated: Button Icon color and hover color in Blog widget.
* Updated: Primary/Secondary Button Icon color and hover color in CTA widget.
* Updated: Button Icon color and hover color in Pricing widget.<h3>1.0.2 => 05-06-2024</h3>    * Tested with elementor version 3.21.4.
* Added requires plugin header for elementor.
* Design update for counter widget.<h3>1.0.1 => 03-08-2023</h3>    * Changes done after plugin review.<h3>1.0.0 => 02-23-2023</h3>    * Initial release.
sections.installation:
NOTE : This plugin works with Elementor. Make sure you have Elementor installed.

  1. Upload the plugin folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. You can type “sublime” on your element tabs within Elementor editor and all the available elements will appear.
  4. Also you can see them under the category “SublimeTheme – Advanced Addons for Elementor” on your element/widget list.
sections.faq:
Can I use the plugin without Elementor Page Builder?

No. You cannot use without Elementor since it’s an addon for Elementor.

Does it work with any theme?

Absolutely! It will work with any theme where Elementor works.
